DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: This is NOT your first time using Dialoguer! Global Float 0: <gf>0</gf>
This is your FIRST TIME using Dialoguer! Gloabl Float 0: <gf>0</gf>
You had FUN last time! :) Global Bool 0: <gb>0</gb>
You did NOT have fun last time. :( Gloabl Bool 0: <gb>0</gb>
This will close, and you will have to wait 60 frames!
Did you have fun?
Great!
How Unfortunate. :(
This will wait TWO seconds with the window still visible.
Now this will loop THREE times!
Great! Thank you! Good Bye!
Welcome to the Dialoguer Test Scene!
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Demo

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: This is a demonstration of an Old School RPG dialogue system!
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Demo

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: Do you understand?
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Demo

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: Great!
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Demo

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: That's unfortunate.
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Demo

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: Thanks for using Dialoguer. Good bye!
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Demo

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: You can use this dialogue template in any project, or use it to learn the Dialoguer system!
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Demo

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: Welcome to the Dialoguer test scene!
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Demo

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: This is a demonstration of a Next-Gen RPG dialogue system!
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Demo

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: Fancy, isn't it?
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Demo

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: Why thank you!
How rude!
Thanks for using Dialoguer. Good bye!
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Demo

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: How many fingers does an average human have on a single hand?
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Demo

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: What? No!
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Demo

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: That's right!
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Demo

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: Moving on, this is a template for Dialoguer. You're able to use it in any game you want.
DialogueEditorPhaseObject.name: Demo

DialogueEditorPhaseObject.text: My name is Anne, I'm very sad
Are you going to be my friend?
Aww :C
Yay! C:
Oh no, I should find him some eyes before, it would be too creepy without
I should find him a kind mouth before
He should have a nose before!
And done!
We'll be best friends forever Mr. Snowman :)
Hi, my name is Anne
I'm not from here, I've grown up South
It was warmer there and I loved running in the grassy fields exploding with flowers of every color you can imagine
My parents moved here and I hate it!
I can't see any of my friends and it's aways cold...
What is that?
It's so pretty! I want to go touch it
This is amazing, maybe I should make a snowman
I've never seen one outside a book
Wow, it's wam today
Even the snow outside is starting to melt...
Oh no! Mr Snowman!
Noooooooo
Mr Snowman don't leave me!
Please please please don't melt
Don't worry little Anne, I won't die,
I'll become water and if you ever need me I'll be in every puddle, lake and sea you see
I should find something to keep him into the shade where it's colder
It's... snowing!
The sun is so bright today
It's a crackling fire
Nice and warm!
No time to sit down
Even the well is frozen
That brings deep into the forest
I'm scared I won't be able to make it back if it starts snowing more
This snow is perfect to make a snowman, now I just need to give him eyes, a mouth, a nose and a hat Oh, and also some arms!
It's perfect!
We're going to be best friends
Hmm... I'm still missing something
This carrot is going to make a great nose!
I could use these buttons for the snowman
Maybe I can use these rocks
These sticks remind me of something
Oooooh, fancy!
And there's also a bowtie to match!
A month passes, and Anne played with Mr Snowman every day, feeling much better than before.
One day the sun comes out and suddenly it's warmer
Oh no, oh no, oh no!
There must be something I can do to keep Mr Snowman cold!
This might help me keep Mr. Snowman in the shade
That's a pretty big umbrella
My mom is making cookies
I'm not allowed to get in because my mom says I eat them all
